channel.title: Flake8 on David J Nevin
channel.description: Recent content in Flake8 on David J Nevin

item.title: Vim as Python IDE
item.description: Vim setup: The never-ending story Joy! I’ve gotten my Python virtual environment set up, installed Flake8() and managed to trouble-shoot a problem with the Syntastic auto-running of Flake8() on save.

item.title: Implementing A Child Class
item.description: A Banking Class Example Following the tutorials in Educative I wrote my first class with inheritance.
